Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: The staff here is over the top They went out of their way to take care of all our needs They learned it was our anniversary and they even signed a card I give this little hotel a 10 for customer service Next time I will for sure stay here again It was also close to everything We walked to the Louvre and the Eiffel Tower

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: My only problem was that they cleaned the rooms very late I left my room at 9 30 in the morning and when I got back at 5 in the afternoon they still had not made up the room
Positive_Review: very comfortable bed and pillows very very clean and comfortable helpful and nice staff great location

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Wifi bit annoying kept having to resign in which was annoying but find most European countries have bad wifi
Positive_Review: Can t fault the hotel everything was clean bed very comfy great size room and bathroom Staff lovely and helpful and breakfast was good too Would stay again

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The edge of the shower is dirty same for behind the sink Very dirty The towels did not smell good When you get out of your room the cleaning staff leave a total mess in front of your door so that it was complicate reaching the elevator
Positive_Review: Staff was polite and prepared

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: It s inconvenient to drop the luggages during the arrival and departure as there is no space to put the car in the narrow and busy street conveniently The most inconvenient part is the missing parking facility for the hotel
Positive_Review: The location nearby the Champs Elysees is very convenient We also like the security the availability of the staff until late night The room is clean and isolated Make sure to visit the Brasserie Baroche around the corner for a great breakfast

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: This is a fantastic small hotel that is perfectedly located just off Champ d Elysees The staff are extremely friendly and go out of their way to help you The quality of the Hotel is first rate with some amazing design work Will be a return visitor here

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Room layout not great bathroom shower not practical We stayed for 4 nights and on third day room not cleaned by 17h00 not acceptable cleaning staff not at fault they seemed overwhelmed
Positive_Review: Great location Excellent breakfast Friendly helpful staff Stylish refurbishment in 2015 6

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The street can get quite noisy during the night I believe there s a nightclub nearby so I d definitely recommend changing to soundproof windows
Positive_Review: Staff was really really nice they offered us an upgrade and umbrellas when it was raining The room we got had a very good space bed was really comfortable and it was super clean

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: There were roadworks right outside but hopefully they are done now
Positive_Review: Locality so close to Champs Elysee and restaurants Rooms decorated with Devinci drawings All facilities available in our room Tea in our room to English standard not normal in France

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: I had a room with street view and it was a nightmare since AC was off for all rooms so I had to open the windows to get some air and that was horrible the noise was too laud so I had to close and open window all night I tried to change the room but the hotel was fully booked bed was too small for 2 persons Queen bed noise was too laud from windows AC was off and cannot control the temp
Positive_Review: the staff were very helpful and nice I cannot say anything regarding staff

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Being ripped off on arrival by taxi driver please make visitors aware that taxi fares are not per person but per location
Positive_Review: Cannot fault this accommodation staff and facilities excellent good overall location

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: The location was unbelievable just next to the Champ But more than that the staff were incredible you will be hard pressed to find a more helping team they were very kind Room was clean beyond Ritz Carlton standarts though ours was a bit small Bed was huge and super comfy Bathroom was very modern and of high quality Breakfast was great definitely worth taking The lady in charge of breakfast area is super sweet We had very nice dialogues with her every morning even without knowing a single word from each other s language It is a special place And for the price it is utterly cheap

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Price per night is a little bit higher
Positive_Review: Amazing place Thank you booking for giving me the opportunity to visit this hotel From now it will be my favorite one when I ll travel to Paris Hope to find good deal for my next trip

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room I stayed in was quite small did not like the view
Positive_Review: Lovely staff they were very friendly The location is excellent in walking distance of the Champs Elysees Good value for money

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: For cleanliness is very low and there is a cleaner of African citizenship is very hostile to the guests as if the guest come because Agadtha cleaning and avenge the guest of deliberately leaving the dirt inside the bed cover and in the corners of the room And sets of odors towels Guest understatement Quite frankly the latter was a black dot in the period of my stay Another note when booking chose the room that bathroom barriers mean it will be a place for Schauer and got away from the bathroom which does not have barriers to Shore to prevent the leakage of water for the room because bathrooms consumer somewhat drainage is not good by In the night water mired as if we were in the Titanic of water leak from the bathroom of the room The bed was also very uncomfortable and consumer
Positive_Review: I stayed in this hotel 10 nights for the secretariat of the very location of the hotel is excellent The reception staff are very friendly and helpful when needed

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel is perfect Staff is very friendly and rooms are very clean they have everything in room I really enjoy to stay in this hotel

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Excellent location just about a 5 minute walk onto the Champs lys es Lovely small friendly hotel And must make a point that the bed was one of the most comfortable we have slept in

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The room was very small and the smallest space for a closet that I have ever seen The toilet was separate from the bathroom and located in a space that rivalled the size of the closet There was no porter to assist with baggage
Positive_Review: The location was great close to many restaurants and shopping and just a few blocks from Champs Elysees Nice bathroom amenities and a selection of teas and coffee provided in room

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Shower needed shelf soap dish but thats just an observation as every thing was excellent
Positive_Review: Reception Staff fantastic and it made up for small issues clean facilities room had all you needed although quite small just a hop skip and jump to Champs Elyesse plenty of bar restuarants and supermarkets high recommended

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Superb location Comfortable and clean suite room Free mini bars and hand phone for us to use when we were in Paris Just love it Definitely will be back

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: The bathroom ceiling was pretty low my husband s head nearly touched the ceiling when he got into the bed for shower
Positive_Review: Our executive room was spacious and the bed very comfortable Although the room is on the first floor facing the street we didn t hear any noise as it was double glazed Windows Everything works in this hotel The receptionist Aurelie is very friendly and helpful throughout our stay Ask her anything she will do her best to help The best thing we love about the hotel is the free use of a Samsung mobile phone that comes with unlimited local calls and data usage which we can take with us on our travel around Paris Amazing value added service that s truly first class for a boutique hotel The wifi in the room is also very good at all times There s an organic mini supermarket just round the corner where you can get lovely organic fruits and snacks

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: I traveled around 20 centuries and stayed in more than 100 hotels but this hotel the best Every one was so very helpful wonderful The ambience of the hotel was beautiful cozy clean Great location in the heart of Paris Great location The room was beautifully decorated with a very large and comfortable bed Loved the roof top terrace The staff were very polite and obliging with helping us locate restaurants and various attractions to see and do while in paris We couldn t fault the hotel and will definitely stay there next time in Paris Thanks Mr Daniel is gentleman and friendly Marie or prinses Marie is cheerful nice and helpful this hotel the best offer in my trip

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: street is very noisy at Saturday night and it interferes sleeping Bed s mattress is over used which makes it a little less comfort
Positive_Review: Location staff very nice and helpful value for money

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: Perfect location I got a super deal on the family suite for a girly weekend away the balcony was the perfect spot to enjoy a glass of wine while getting ready for a Parisian night out Super helpful staff too All around excellent visit

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: We had the family suite for 4 and we loved it and the only thing that we did not like is the lack of strong lighting We would come back to a dim room and it was slightly depressing I would recommend they increase number of lights and make them stronger even in bathroom
Positive_Review: I did not have breakfast at hotel so cannot comment on that We had the family suite and it was big enough for all 3 of us and our bags The best thing was the location a few minutes to Champs Elysee street and a lot of great restaurants around The staff were excellent and very helpful with directions etc One of our bag locks got stuck and the nice lady housekeeper helped us to reopen bag The beds and pillows were very comfortable The heating was good yet room still a little cold We had read about this before so we brought our own blankets Bathroom was great and they had these essence boxes that you could attach to shower and the water coming down would smell better The bathroom amenities that were offered were great nothing less than Hermes and they put enough towels for 4 But the nicest thing was that you get free soft drinks daily and 1 bottle of water Also free coffee was offered in the lounge for anyone all day as well as these delicious Eiffel tower shaped soft candy that were yummy and addictive I loved this hotel and would return definitely

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: bathroom very small and bathroom door not sound proof breakfast place too small without window and too close to noisy kitchen no gym
Positive_Review: location very good room comfortable and staff very helpful

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Too small room No bidet in the bathroom Poor dark street view Due to credit card booking procedure one night price is still blocked on my account
Positive_Review: Nice courteous staff Copious buffet breakfast Complimentary coffee in the hall Coffee tea kettle in the room Nearby restaurants and shopping Good free wifi in the room

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Positive_Review: I was in love with the staff they were 24 7 ready for anything that we needed the hotel have a perfect location all I can said is Monir and Aurelie will see you again if you come before to New York city please give the pleasure to see you and invite you to dinner You re wonderful

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Our friends who stayed in the double rooms said that their rooms were too small
Positive_Review: the location of the hotel is great you are just few steps away from Champs Elysees street We stayed in the suit room it was huge and perfect Clean and helpful stuff

Hotel_Name: H tel Monna Lisa Champs Elys es
Negative_Review: Room was sooo small you barely had a chance to move around The floor looked very dirty because of old hardwood full of scratches
Positive_Review: Location was great easy access to transportation and very central

Negative_Review: Cannot fault hotel on any aspect

Negative_Review: the hotel has a few minor flaws in the tiling in the bathroom and some finishes which are worn this didn t effect my stay but I had a good rate at full price this would have disappointed me

Negative_Review: The room that we found on line and booked was not the room we ended up getting once we arrived We found a room with a couch and that s what we booked and once we arrived they switched our room and there was only room for 2 people instead of 3 we had to book another with additional cost which we were not expecting The hotel did discount the room at a cheeper rate but felt that the web page information was misleading
